episode.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episode.description: Today: making small talk with a client. Raphael Marso, from Germany, works at a company that makes manufacturing equipment. He takes on a roleplay challenge to help improve his Japanese skills.
episode.subtitle: #25 Making small talk with a client
episode.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episode.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episode.description: Today: asking others for favors. Warni Letty Yuhara, from Indonesia, works at a farm in Ibaraki Prefecture. She struggles with others to stay late. To improve, she tackles a roleplay challenge.
episode.subtitle: #27 Asking others for favors
episode.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episode.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episode.description: Today: checking that others have understood instructions. Shang Yan, from China, works as a train cleaner in Tokyo. To improve her skills as a team leader, she tackles a roleplay challenge.
episode.subtitle: #28 Checking that others have understood instructions
episode.title: Easy Japanese for Work
